short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bulk downloads files from our beloved keats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
k3ats is a student helper! Bulk module downloader and search!

If you study at kings I have some great news. 

Do you know those modules with plenty of important files? 

I have built an extension for your chrome browser that lets you view and search all the files in your module page. 

#Downloading All!

Extension will download all of your files straight into a folder. You can find this folder inside your downloads.

#Search 

Quickly search through all the files in your module.

[update 0.6] Minor bug fixes, single download indicator disabled.

[update 0.5] Big update, major issues and UI bugs fixed. Added port waiting list for broken ports. Now with a status indicator!
